trans-unit.source: Contains a collection of ConfigurationLocationCollection objects.
trans-unit.target: Contiene una raccolta di oggetti ConfigurationLocationCollection.

trans-unit.source: Use the ConfigurationLocationCollection class to iterate through a collection of <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationLocation> objects, which represent the resources for which location-specific configuration settings are defined.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare la classe ConfigurationLocationCollection per scorrere una raccolta di <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationLocation>oggetti che rappresentano le risorse per cui vengono definite le impostazioni di configurazione specifici della posizione.</xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationLocation>

trans-unit.source: ConfigurationLocationCollection is the type returned by the <xref:System.Configuration.Configuration.Locations%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: ConfigurationLocationCollection è il tipo restituito per il <xref:System.Configuration.Configuration.Locations%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Configuration.Configuration.Locations%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The ConfigurationLocationCollection class might not reference the collection of <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationLocation> objects in the order that they are specified in the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > ConfigurationLocationCollection la classe non può fare riferimento la raccolta di <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationLocation>oggetti nell'ordine in cui sono state specificate nel file di configurazione.</xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationLocation>

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationLocationCollection"></xref> object at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationLocationCollection"> </xref> oggetto in corrispondenza dell'indice specificato.

trans-unit.source: Use the Item accessor to the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationLocationCollection> class to get a specific <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationLocation> object from the collection by specifying its index within the collection.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare la funzione di accesso di elemento per la <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationLocationCollection>classe per ottenere un oggetto specifico <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationLocation>oggetto dalla raccolta specificando il relativo indice all'interno della raccolta.</xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationLocation> </xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationLocationCollection>

trans-unit.source: The index location of the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationLocationCollection"></xref> to return.
trans-unit.target: La posizione di indice di <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationLocationCollection"> </xref> da restituire.
